Title: Establishes a bicycle and electric scooter operator's safety manual and licensing requirement
Summary: Establishes a bicycle and electric scooter operator's safety manual; provides for the issuance of a license for residents who successfully read and comprehend the operator's safety manual; requires residents who operate a bicycle, bicycle with electric assist or electric scooter in New York City to have a license to operate such devices.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a bicycle and electric scooter operator's safety manual and licensing requirement
